title.native: SHOW BY ROCK!!ましゅまいれっしゅ!!

description:
The third season of SHOW BY ROCK!!.

Though she enjoys her peaceful life in the countryside, Howan dreams of music stardom, and gets the chance to achieve her dream when she passes the audition for a music competition in the big city. Meanwhile, the guitarist Himeko is equally passionate about music, but feels uncomfortable having been placed in a band with two other young artists. Under the glittering lights of Midi City, these two musicians will meet for the first time, and discover together what they could never reach alone. In this dazzling city of music, anyone can truly reach for the stars!

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
[Agency Profile](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/tono_hikaru/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hikaru_tono) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hikaru_tono/) 

Non-anime roles:
Tribbie - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

__Height:__ 155cm 

**[Agency Profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=W135) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/__yuuuumr__)**


**Non anime roles:**
- Kyoyama Kazusa - Blue Archive (Video Game)
- Sabrina - Granblue Fantasy (Video Game)

__Alma Mater:__ Amusement Media Academy
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ayaMiNTgreen) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yaya_usap/) | [Agency Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/yamane-aya.html)

__Non-anime roles:__
- D - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/shuhomitani)

Shuuho Mitani  is a Japanese guitarist, composer and arranger affiliated with [AP DREAM](http://apdream.co.jp/creators/)

Funta is a duo consisting of vocalist/songwriter UCO (U子) and guitarist/keyboardist Yoshimi (吉見). The Funta "sound" can be characterized as having a strong pop rock sensibility with a tendency toward electronic elements and moe-pop vocals.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/858004051778166784)

Affiliated with [Kinema Citrus](https://anilist.co/studio/290/). Specializes in action scenes.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/155544/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/小島正幸) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masayuki_Kojima)

Originating from Kaname Production, currently affiliated with [Kinema Citrus](https://anilist.co/studio/290/).

Known for directing shows such as [Monster](https://anilist.co/anime/19/), [Made in Abyss](https://anilist.co/anime/97986/) and [Hanada Shounen-shi](https://anilist.co/anime/2004/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1189754972) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/bushi2424.bsky.social) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2415493) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=takeshi_maenami)

He has gathered a lot of attention with his incredibly dynamic, [Kanada](https://anilist.co/staff/106398/)-inspired cuts in [Pokémon Sun & Moon](https://anilist.co/anime/97634/). His animation is characterized by erratic snappy timing, liberal and ample use of smears (often with a complete lack of outlines), and extreme perspectives. 

Graduated Yoyogi Animation School in 2009, but spent much of the following years helping out at his parents' restaurant and didn't start formally working as an animator until 2018. Currently affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858).
